moments.title: Where It All Began
moments.description: Our first meeting at the Ennichisai cosplay event, on the rooftop of Blok M Square. A funny misunderstanding between 'ngeker (aiming)' and 'nyeker (barefoot)' that still makes me smile. Sometimes the best stories start with a little confusion and a lot of warmth.

moments.title: A Number, a Smile, and ChatTime
moments.description: Meeting again at the GJUI cosplay event. I remember waiting for you, buying ChatTime, and meeting through the fence because you didn't have a ticket. That was the first time I got your number — a simple moment that meant everything.

moments.title: From Messages to Moments
moments.place: Jiyuu Matsuri Event, Universitas Negeri Jakarta
moments.description: Our conversations grew more frequent. Playing ML together, short meetups, taking photos with many different styles. Everything felt easy and natural when we were together.

moments.title: Meeting Again, Quietly
moments.description: Back at Ennichisai, but in the basement this time. You cosplayed as kesshouban from Hataraku Saibou. It was a quiet, slightly awkward reconnection after some time apart — but seeing you again felt like coming home.

moments.title: Turning Moments into Memories
moments.description: Reconnecting after a long pause and even unfollowing each other. Our first real date. We talked about where life had taken us, what had changed, and what stayed the same. It felt mature, gentle, and right.

moments.title: Wrong Directions but Chose a Right Person
moments.description: Mujigae Restaurant with its fried rice and melting cheese. Google Maps led me to Summarecon Bekasi instead of Serpong — completely the wrong direction. But somehow, being with you made even the detours feel worth it. Light K-pop conversations and good food with the right person.

moments.title: With You, Everything Feels Better
moments.description: Attending a colleague's wedding together, then visiting the coffee shop collaboration launch in Jagakarsa. I felt grateful, proud, and simply better — because you were there. No expectations, just appreciation for those shared moments.
